📊 Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Analysis Report

🎯 Executive Summary

The Mahindra XUV 3XO is a compact SUV offering a blend of performance, safety, and technology. Key features include powerful engine options, advanced safety features like Level 2 ADAS, and a spacious interior with modern amenities. The vehicle is available in both petrol and diesel variants with manual and automatic transmission options. Its dimensions provide a balanced combination of urban maneuverability and interior space.

🔍 Market Landscape Overview

The Mahindra XUV 3XO competes in the compact SUV segment, rivaling models like Hyundai Creta, Tata Nexon, and Maruti Suzuki Brezza. It aims to offer a compelling package with its strong engine performance, advanced features, and competitive pricing.

🛠️ Detailed Features Breakdown

Standout Features:

  • Soft touch material on dashboard and door pads.
  • Panoramic sunroof - largest in the segment.
  • Level 2 ADAS with features such as forward collision warning, adaptive cruise control.
  • 1.2-litre turbo-petrol engine makes 130PS/230Nm – most powerful in its class.

⚙️ Engine Specifications

The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers multiple engine options:

  • Petrol Engine: 1197 cc, 128.73bhp@5000rpm, 230Nm@1500-3750rpm
  • Diesel Engine: 1498 cc, 115.05 kW @3750rpm, 300Nm@1500-2500rpm

It is available with Manual & Automatic transmission. Fuel type includes both Petrol and Diesel.

🛡️ Safety Features

Key safety features include:

  • Anti-lock Braking System (ABS)
  • Air Conditioner
  • Driver Airbag
  • Passenger Airbag
  • Automatic Climate Control

📏 Dimensions & Capacity

  • Length: 3990 mm
  • Width: 1821 mm
  • Height: 1647 mm
  • Wheelbase: 2600 mm
  • Boot Space: 364 Litres
  • Seating Capacity: 5
  • Fuel Tank Capacity: 42 Litres

EMI calculator Get EMI offers Enquire now Mahindra XUV 3XO highlights The XUV 3XO gets two petrol and one diesel engine option. The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV. The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV. 📊 Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Analysis Report

🎯 Executive Summary

The Mahindra XUV 3XO is a compact SUV offering a blend of performance, safety, and technology. Key features include powerful engine options, advanced safety features like Level 2 ADAS, and a spacious interior with modern amenities. The vehicle is available in both petrol and diesel variants with manual and automatic transmission options. Its dimensions provide a balanced combination of urban maneuverability and interior space.

🔍 Market Landscape Overview

The Mahindra XUV 3XO competes in the compact SUV segment, rivaling models like Hyundai Creta, Tata Nexon, and Maruti Suzuki Brezza. It aims to offer a compelling package with its strong engine performance, advanced features, and competitive pricing.

🛠️ Detailed Features Breakdown

Standout Features:

  • Soft touch material on dashboard and door pads.
  • Panoramic sunroof - largest in the segment.
  • Level 2 ADAS with features such as forward collision warning, adaptive cruise control.
  • 1.2-litre turbo-petrol engine makes 130PS/230Nm – most powerful in its class.

⚙️ Engine Specifications

The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers multiple engine options:

  • Petrol Engine: 1197 cc, 128.73bhp@5000rpm, 230Nm@1500-3750rpm
  • Diesel Engine: 1498 cc, 115.05 kW @3750rpm, 300Nm@1500-2500rpm

It is available with Manual & Automatic transmission. Fuel type includes both Petrol and Diesel.

🛡️ Safety Features

Key safety features include:

  • Anti-lock Braking System (ABS)
  • Air Conditioner
  • Driver Airbag
  • Passenger Airbag
  • Automatic Climate Control

📏 Dimensions & Capacity

  • Length: 3990 mm
  • Width: 1821 mm
  • Height: 1647 mm
  • Wheelbase: 2600 mm
  • Boot Space: 364 Litres
  • Seating Capacity: 5
  • Fuel Tank Capacity: 42 Litres

📜 Source Citations

  • Mahindra XUV 3XO Official Website
  • CarDekho - Mahindra XUV 3XO Specifications
  • Jubilant Mahindra - XUV 3XO Specifications
  • Autocar India - Mahindra XUV 3XO Specifications
  • Carfolio - Mahindra XUV 3XO Specifications

all_globals_schema.agent_prompt: Create a comprehensive and well-structured report detailing the features of the Mahindra XUV 3XO. Use the detailed feature information provided in the input. The report should be rich, visually organized, and in a human-readable format.
all_globals_schema.original_query: I want to know the details of features for Mahindra XUV 3XO, use a single step for Retriever Agent but use multiple iterations in a single step to fetch detailed information (using the pattern --> find sources → extract details) and then create a report.
